summary: The video shows a group of esports players celebrating with a trophy. One player is seen writing on a large board with various game titles. The team members are smiling and holding up their awards.
caption: A group of esports players are celebrating their victory, holding trophies and posing for photos. One player is shown writing on a board displaying various game titles. The atmosphere is celebratory.
transcript: Everybody want to know what I would do if I didn't win. I guess we'll never know.
